text.__SUMMARY__:
Iresine diffusa (Juba's bush) is a species of plant in the family Amaranthaceae.
Appearance: 
Herb 1–2 m, stem a little grooved, nodes jointed.  Leaves opp, 14 x 7 cm, edge smooth.  Flowers minute, greenish-white, panicle 40 cm long, male more open, female compact, 1 mm.  Seed 0.5 mm. conabio
Folk Use:
ovary inflammation in Peru. [Bussman, J Ethnobiol Ethnomed 6:30 2010 PMID 21040536 http://www.ethnobiomed.com/content/6//30].
Chemistry:
Drimenes in aerial parts. [Rios, Magn Reson Chem 43:339 2005 PMID 15674810].
